19 package com.webtrends.harness.component.cache
20 
21 /**
22  * Cache config object used for any cache types (Like Memcache)
23  */
24 case class CacheConfig(
25   name:String="Memcache-Client",
26   namespace:String="default",
27   setKey:String="",
28   props:Option[Map[String, Any]]=None) {
29 
30   def getProperty(key: String, default:Option[Any]=None): Option[Any] = {
31     val map = props.getOrElse(Map())
32     val result = map.getOrElse(key, null)
33     if (result == null) {
34       default
35     } else {
36       Some(result)
37     }
38   }
39 }

32 55 1135 - 1159 Apply scala.collection.MapLike.getOrElse map.getOrElse[Any](key, null)
33 56 1168 - 1182 Apply scala.Any.== result.==(null)
34 57 1192 - 1199 Ident com.webtrends.harness.component.cache.CacheConfig.default default
36 59 1219 - 1231 Block scala.Some.apply scala.Some.apply[Any](result)
